title: Fresh Produce Donation
text: I have surplus vegetables from my garden that I'd love to share with the community. Anyone interested?

title: Canned Goods Collection
text: I've got some extra canned goods that I would like to donate to those in need. Let me know if you could use them!

title: Bakery Surplus
text: I run a bakery and have surplus bread and pastries. Happy to share them with anyone who needs them.

title: Community Garden Harvest
text: Our community garden had a bountiful harvest! We have fresh fruits and vegetables available for pickup.

title: Surplus Meal Packages
text: I have surplus meal packages that I prepared for a party. Would be happy to donate them to a shelter or anyone in need.

title: Farm Fresh Eggs Available
text: Our farm has an abundance of fresh eggs. Let me know if you'd like to pick some up!
